backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing app state with screen transitions and balloon popping logic, including validation and a getState query.
feature_evidence.json: Report listing feature tickets, related frontend files, components used, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme CSS defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Google Fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing screen flow, fade transitions, and restart logic using state and refs.
frontend/src/components/Balloon.tsx: Balloon SVG component with popping animation and click handling.
frontend/src/components/Confetti.tsx: Generates falling confetti pieces with randomized positions, colors, and animation timings.
frontend/src/components/FramedPhoto.tsx: Displays a framed photo with skeleton loading, sparkles, and error fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/PrimaryCtaButton: Reusable CTA button wrapper applying themed styles and size/variant options.
frontend/src/components/ZoomPanImage.tsx: Image viewer with zoom, pan, reset controls, loading states, and gesture/mouse interaction via useZoomPan.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching authenticated or anonymous backend actors and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient setup and exposes status flags through a custom hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for fetching app state and performing screen and balloon mutations via the backend actor. Automatically refreshes state after mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useZoomPan.ts: Implements zoom and pan gesture handling with scale limits, drag movement, and pointer/wheel event listeners. Returns state and controls like zoomIn, zoomOut, and reset.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom color variables, themes, animations, and decorative utility classes. Includes birthday-themed color tokens and styled frame effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering. Imports global styles.
frontend/src/pages/BalloonScreen.tsx: Renders an interactive balloon-popping screen that plays a pop sound and advances once all balloons are popped. Displays themed styling and a progress indicator.
frontend/src/pages/CakeScreen.tsx: Shows a birthday cake screen with confetti and a CTA button to proceed to the balloon screen. Uses animated visuals and themed styling.
frontend/src/pages/FinalScreen.tsx: Displays the final celebratory birthday message with floating hearts, animations, and a restart button. Reveals an additional message with a timed fade-in effect.
frontend/src/pages/HandwrittenNoteScreen: Displays a decorated handwritten note card with sparkles and a next button, using ZoomPanImage and themed gradients.
frontend/src/pages/IntroScreen.tsx: Shows an intro birthday screen with a panda image, celebratory text, and a button to start the experience.
frontend/src/pages/LoadingScreen.tsx: Implements a 3â€‘second loading screen with an animated progress bar and triggers onComplete when finished.
frontend/src/pages/MessageScreen1.tsx: Presents a tappable message card that expands to reveal a framed photo and birthday text, then shows a next button.
frontend/src/pages/MessageScreen2.tsx: Provides a second tappable message card with a photo, emojis, and a birthday message, followed by a next button.
frontend/src/pages/PreFinalLoadingScreen: Runs a short timed loading animation with a progress bar before transitioning to the next screen.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins for animate and typography.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the birthday web app, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features.
